Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: On June 4th, we were announcing our partnership with ID Quantique to develop the Quantum Vault, an ultra secure crypto custody solution that we would be using for our future bank.  Today, we are happy to announce today that Mt Pelerin and its partners ID Quantique, University of Geneva and Services Industriels de Gen√®ve will be receiving funding from the European Union as part of its OPENQKD research project, an initiative launched by the union to create a highly secure quantum-based communication infrastructure on the continent:  https://www.mtpelerin.com/blog/mt-pelerin-receives-funding-from-european-union-for-quantum-vault.html

Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: Mt Pelerin was invited on Block Valley's podcast to talk about Mt Pelerin, tokenization and compliance.  He also reveals some info about what the team is currently working on so make sure to listen until the end!  Get the podcast on iTunes or on its web page.

Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: On June 6th, Mt Pelerin will participate to a seminar on the future of the blockchain in financial markets, and the tokenization, custody and trading of digital assets at the EPFL in Lausanne.  The seminar is organized by the CMTA and EPFL, and besides Mt Pelerin there will be other experts speaking on the topic including Lenz & Staehelin, Swissquote, CV VC and others.  Entry is free, but you need to register on: http://www.cmta.ch/event-dlt-in-swiss-financial-markets/

Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: Meet the Token Forge, the first interface for the BRIDGE ecosystem!  It is a free self-service available for any organization to create its own equity token (other types of security tokens will be added in the future), and manage its related transferability restriction rules and token sales.  This initial publicly available release is a Testnet version, with the purpose of letting you try and explore different possible token setups. To bring your ideal configurations live, please contact us to set it up.  Although the Token Forge is a tool for people comfortable with using the blockchain, it will be detailed in upcoming versions to facilitate its use so don't hesitate to give any feedback!  Discover on www.mtpelerin.com/services/token-forge

Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: "The democratization of finance is about reshaping how capital flows and fuels the real economy, the one creating jobs and growth. For us, it means letting people decide if and how their deposits should be invested, and letting companies address the crowd directly to fund their business."  Read the latest interview of Mt Pelerin CEO Arnaud Salomon by Digitalasset.live:  https://digitalasset.live/2019/08/06/blockchain-bank/

Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: "We are integrating in a single place, as a Swiss bank, full primary and secondary markets capabilities as well as custody, liquidity and payments designed in a way that anyone can use and understand."  Read the interview of Mt Pelerin's CEO Arnaud Salomon by STOcheck.com on:  https://medium.com/stocheck/the-future-of-investment-banking-be91b07c4fc7

Author: shitcoinoffering
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: I'd trust it if real Swiss bank decided to create crypto bank and started ICO. The other thing is that banks are full of money and liquidity, they even do not need ICO to add Blockchain to their banking services.  But the situation looks like a typical fairy tail: Once somebody wanted to get rich or die trying. - How to gain money easy and fast in 2019? - ICO (said voice in the mind) - What ICO ? - Finance, investing, banking - Well, Swiss banks look trustful, we'll implement this idea...  So the founder wrote whitepaper, roadmap, launched site and started involving investors... Is it possible to be real ?

Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: The system that we are building is blockchain agnostic, meaning that it will be able to work with most Solidity based blockchains. It uses Ethereum now, but we are already working to support Rootstock too to have a bridge with Bitcoin. Other blockchains may be used in the future according to performance needs.

Author: JL0
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: What is the difference between you and the other crypto banks in Switzerland? For example SEBA Crypto AG or Bitcoin Suisse AG. Do they also have the same interests as you? Mt Pelerin Mobile App is the same like the Ibani App just a Copy ?

Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: No exchange listing ETA yet, make sure to subscribe to our newsletter or join our Telegram group to be informed when there will be some news!

Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: Great question!  The difference is that we will not be a crypto bank. Although dealing with cryptocurrencies is something that we plan to do at a later stage, what we are building is a bank entirely built on the blockchain to create the first comprehensive ecosystem for issuing, managing and trading any kind of tokenized financial instruments. By also opening this ecosystem to all, we will create a unique place with unique tools for both individuals and businesses to find financing and investment products.  From the little information that is available from them, Seba wants to make a crypto bank, i.e. offering banking services dealing with cryptocurrencies.  Bitcoin Suisse is not a bank, it's a cryptocurrency trading company.

Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: We are happy to announce that Mt Pelerin will be a partner of the first edition of the Geneva Annual Blockchain Congress, which will take place on January 21st 2019 at Palexpo Geneva.  We will be present on the floor with a booth where you will be able to meet us, and our CEO Arnaud Salomon will be participating to the panel "How can the banking system adapt to digital assets?".  As a member of the Mt Pelerin community, you can benefit from a 20% discount on ticket prices by using the code MTPELBLOCK at the checkout.  Get your ticket now: https://palexpo.shop.secutix.com/selection/pass?productId=1321743407  Fore more information about the event, please visit its official website.  We hope to see you there!

Author: anggriani
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: How many results from your current sales, have you reached the target? Do you plan to release the wallet in Q4 2018, is the wallet currently available? MT Pelerin is a crypto bank, so will you later create an ATM machine and POS terminal?

Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: Hi, you can see the live results of our sale here.  Quote Do you plan to release the wallet in Q4 2018, is the wallet currently available?   The beta is visible on our Gitlab, and the release is still in development. We won't make it for Q4, but we will announce an updated roadmap about this soon.  Quote MT Pelerin is a crypto bank, so will you later create an ATM machine and POS terminal?  No we are not a crypto bank, we are building a bank on blockchain. ATM machines and POS terminals are definitely part of what we want to do, but that would come at a later stage after our core services will have been rolled out. I invite you to refer to our roadmap presented in our whitepaper available on our website.

Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: Our token sale ends tomorrow at noon (CET), and with it the unique opportunity there will ever be to acquire the only freely transferable shares of Mt Pelerin Group SA.  Don't miss this historic moment and join us in the journey to create the bank of the future:  https://www.mtpelerin.com/invest

Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: With 2018 reaching its end, we wanted to say that we feel really lucky and grateful for having received your support during our beginnings.  This year will have been quite intensive for the project, with notably the release of the Mt Pelerin Bridge Protocol, the most advanced open-source mechanism for the compliant tokenization of financial instruments.  We had a first demonstration of its potential with the tokenization of our own equity, something never done before. This achievement was possible through our joining the CMTA and the publication of the association's blueprint for the tokenization of shares.  As a result, we conducted our first round of funding with the MPS token sale, which demonstrated the power of tokenized assets through the ease with which the public could acquire seed equity, without intermediary!  We are now fully geared to build up on these achievements and leap toward our ambition to change the way we bank. We can't wait to show you what's coming next!  Stay tuned for more updates soon...   We wish you a Merry Christmas and a Happy Holiday season !

There will also be a tech demo, and a panel discussion featuring:  - Fedor Poskriakov, Partner at Lenz & Staehelin - PD PhD Jean Marc Seigneur, Director of the CAS Blockchain from Geneva University - Arnaud Salomon, Mt Pelerin CEO  Attendance is free but registration is mandatory here:  https://www.meetup.com/mtpelerin/events/256779376/  Drinks and food included !

Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: The application for a banking license takes anywhere between 4 to 9 months to be reviewed. Our objective is to submit the application by the end of the year or very early next year.  For your question about the laws, everything is described in the Code of Obligations in the section about the Company Limited by Shares that you can consult on the Swiss government website here: https://www.admin.ch/opc/en/classified-compilation/19110009/index.html#id-ni56-ni69  For your last question, what do you mean there are no exact numbers? Are you referring to this page?

Author: WorldCoiner
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: Building the Bank of Tomorrow  Mt Pelerin is a Swiss project to create the first bank to be fully built on blockchain in total compliance with regulations. More than a crypto bank, Mt Pelerin will bring the legacy world of finance on the blockchain, and not the other way around.  It aims to obtain relevant Swiss banking licenses in late 2019, a preliminary process started in early 2018 with the help of two of the Big Four firms and some of Switzerland's best banking lawyers.  Mt Pelerin is defining a protocol to use blockchains for banking services, and building a core banking system that tokenizes the entire bank's balance sheet.  Its ambition is to shape the future of the way we bank, by democratizing complex financial products and services in a simple, transparent and cost-efficient way.  At the same time, it aims to seamlessly bridge the crypto economy with traditional finance.    Official Website | Github  Telegram | Facebook | Twitter | YouTube | Reddit | Medium | LinkedIn | Instragram   Business Model  Our Mission  Protected by heavy regulations, the world of banking has always been a walled garden hermetic to disruption. Now more than ever, a paradigm shift is called for and all the tools are now here to enable the banking industry to evolve. At Mt Pelerin, we want to see this long-overdue evolution take place with a new business model, which tokenizes the entire bank to offer banking services in a whole new way, while effectively bridging the new crypto world with traditional banking.  To achieve this, we have designed an approach based on three pillars:   1. 100% Deposit Reserve   Money deposited on Mt Pelerin‚Äôs current accounts will be kept in full in highly liquid reserve, with the state of the total reserve being public and reported in real time on chain. Unlike other banks, we will not reinvest our customers‚Äô deposits in risky assets for our own profit.  2. Marketplace Approach  With deposits being kept safely in reserve, Mt Pelerin will offer banking services through marketplaces with the necessary compliance and technological facilitation built-in for third party providers. Integrated in an e-banking portal, the goal of these marketplaces will be to connect customers and third party providers and let them freely offer and request services at the conditions they choose.  The marketplaces that Mt Pelerin wants to offer include:  ‚ñ™ Currency spot exchange ‚ñ™ Futures and derivatives ‚ñ™ Loans ‚ñ™ Savings ‚ñ™ Products for small and medium businesses ‚ñ™ Tokenized funds ‚ñ™ Corporate finance ‚ñ™ Trade finance  3. Tokenization  Our ambition is to tokenize all assets (loans, for instance) and liabilities (deposits), i.e. issue them on Ethereum blockchain (at launch) as ERC20 compatible tokens, creating an ecosystem where smart contracts can be applied to any financial instrument that has a market value. With this approach, we want to bring an unprecedented level of liquidity and convenience to the trade of banking and financial instruments, resulting in disruption of the status quo. This would also create an effective bridge between crypto assets and classical finance.  Modular and Open Platform  On the technological side, we want to have an inclusive approach by building an open banking tech environment that will benefit all participants. Our marketplaces will be built as an open platform providing core services, on top of which micro-services will be added as independent API based software bricks. We will be able to connect the services of third parties to our bricks, and even add their own complementary bricks to our platform.  Compliance & Regulation  We will strive to become the first blockchain-based bank to be established and completely regulated in a country renowned for the stability and excellence of its financial and legal environment, but also for its open-mindedness about blockchain and cryptocurrencies: Switzerland.  We are working towards obtaining relevant licenses (notably banking and security dealer licenses) from Switzerland‚Äôs financial regulator(FINMA), and we are preparing the regulatory compliance of our services, structure and funding proposal. For this critical regulatory part, we are working together with some of Switzerland‚Äôs best business lawyers and banking specialists.  With this upstream preparation, we want our investors to have as much confidence as possible that the funds invested in our project will go towards its implementation and not into the resolution of regulatory conflicts that would come from insufficient planning.   >> More Details in our White Paper <<   Project Funding  Purpose  Establishing a bank in Switzerland is an expensive endeavour, and the authority delivering banking licenses has many strict requirements. Its financial requirements include a minimum bank share capital, sufficient funding to cover three years of operational costs, and of course funds to cover legal & audit costs. We therefore come to you to raise funds for this historical project, to involve you in the creation of the institution that many of you have been calling for.  Seed Round  To raise the initial funding necessary to develop Mt Pelerin, we invite you to become a shareholder of Mt Pelerin Group SA, which will hold the bank of the future.  To make this possible, Mt Pelerin Group SA is the first company in the world to tokenize its shares on the blockchain and to sell tokens that are recognized as shares and provide legal protection conferred by Swiss law. Indeed, they include full voting and dividend rights once the token holder is registered. This is why we have named our token MPS for Mt Pelerin Shares.  Moreover, the investment of the first believers in our project means a lot to us, which is why our equity structure is designed to protect you from any dilution in case of a second round of funding.   Sale Details  The token and sale details are all available on this page: https://www.mtpelerin.com/invest  Sale Dates  Start: October 30th 2018 - 12h00 (noon) CET End: December 15th 2018 - 12h00 (noon) CET  Registration  To register for the sale, please go to: https://www.mtpelerin.com/invest   Main Funding Round  To be announced.   Roadmap    Wallet  For the needs of our project, we are also developing an open-source, fully decentralized wallet that can store and manage cryptocurrencies, ERC-20 compatible tokens and smart contracts. Our wallet will also support SBTC and ERC20 on the Rootstock (RSK) blockchain.  Separate wallet announcement thread coming soon.  Github   Team & Advisors  Team  Arnaud Salomon - Founder & CEO  Cyril Lapinte - CTO  Eric Berling - CFO  Jingyao Jin - COO  Reynald Besson - VP Legal and Compliance  S√©bastien Krafft - VP Engineering  Yann Gerardi - VP Marketing  Laurent Aapro - VP Security and Blockchain  David Llobet-Calaf - VP Trade Finance  Yannick Zehnder - Marketing Advisor  Dan Quinton - Community Manager  Azusa Kato Kozma - Community Manager   Advisors  Kuno Kennel - Chairman of the Board of Directors of the Schwyzer Kantonalbank  Dr. J√ºrg Conzett - Founder & Head of the Z√ºrich MoneyMuseum, Founder of the Sunflower Foundation  Dr. Michael Stumm - Professor at University of Toronto, Co-Founder & Former President of Oanda  Marc Bettinger - aka Altcoindad (ex owner of "Der Altcoinspekulant"), Director at Forctis.io, Altcoin veteran.  Alexandre Kozma - Vice-President Senior Bonds Portofolio Manager at Banque Pictet & Cie  Paul Wang - Cybersecurity Advocate

Author: Starax
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: I usually don‚Äôt comment on bitcointalk, I‚Äôm just a lurker. But considering how young the community for this project still is, I feel like I should respond. If it‚Äôs a scam, it‚Äôd be a really dumb one considering the regulatory environment in which they decided to get into. The seed round was pegged to the Eth price for both 1st and 2nd round at the time of TGE, so there may have been some discrepancies with the amount of token received, but this does happen sometimes during early stage funding. Regarding the public sale, it‚Äôs simply false; main sale investors have the same peg in fiat without any further bonus.

Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: Many of you asked us what has been the legal base and process to achieve the tokenization of our shares in Switzerland.  An entire step-by-step document has been publicly released by the CMTA, the Swiss association whose mission is to define the standards for the application of blockchain in finance.  Mt Pelerin is a member of the association, and was the first company to put this blueprint to practice with its MPS token.  Read more about it here:  https://www.mtpelerin.com/blog/blueprint-for-the-tokenization-of-shares.html

Author: Mt Pelerin
Title: [ANN] Mt Pelerin - Swiss Blockchain Banking
Body: Mt Pelerin's MPS tokens are real tokenized shares, i.e. one token simply equals on share in the holding company that will own the bank we are creating, its core banking, tokenization and compliance technologies.  Token holders are therefore shareholders protected by Swiss law, with full voting and dividend rights. A world first for tokens to be considered as shares in a reputable jurisdiction, without resorting to a private law contract in order to simulate shares between investors and the company.  Read more about this achievement in this blog article.
